description:
Login to the websiste using the following credentialss
username: test_user_name
password: test_password

Verify that "The Store" title is visible on the home page.
Go to shoes category
Click on the first item that shows up on the page.
Add that product to the cart.
Go to the cart and verify that the product is in the cart.
Add shipping details as follows:
   - Name: "Amanda Kim"
   - Email: "amanda.kim@example.com"
   - Street Address: "123 Main Street"
   - City: "Anytown"
   - State: "CA"
   - Zipcode: "12345"
5. Click "Checkout" button
6. Verify redirect to order success page
7. Verify order confirmation number is displayed.

steps.stepDescription: Open a web browser and navigate to the URL: http://localhost:3005
Enter username 'test_user_name' and password 'test_password' into the login fields.
Click the 'Login' button to authenticate and access the home page.
Verify that the home page displays the title 'The Store'.
Click on the 'Shoes' category from the navigation menu or category list.
Press the PageDown key to scroll down and ensure the products are visible.
Click on the first product that appears on the shoes category page.
On the product detail page, click the 'Add to Cart' button.
Navigate to the cart page by clicking on the cart icon or link.
Verify that the selected product is displayed in the cart.
Fill in the shipping details: Name 'Amanda Kim', Email 'amanda.kim@example.com', Street Address '123 Main Street', City 'Anytown', State 'CA', and Zipcode '12345'.
Click the 'Checkout' button to submit the order.
Verify that you are redirected to the order success page.
Verify that the order confirmation number is displayed on the order success page.
Take a screenshot of the completed task to confirm successful checkout.

generatedSteps.stepsSummary: Login, select product, and checkout order

description:
Login to the websiste using the following credentialss
username: test_user_name
password: test_password

Verify that "The Store" title is visible on the home page.
Go to shoes category
Click on the first item that shows up on the page.
Add that product to the cart.
Go to the cart and verify that there is one product in the cart.
Click on the "Checkout Button" and verify user stays on the same page.

Verify that: name, and email field shoes error state or red border.

steps.stepDescription: Open a web browser and navigate to the URL: http://localhost:3005
Enter username 'test_user_name' in the username field on the login page
Enter password 'test_password' in the password field on the login page
Click the login button and wait for the home page to load
Verify that the title 'The Store' is visible on the home page
Click the 'Shoes' category link or button from the navigation menu
Wait for the shoes category page to complete loading
Scroll down using the PageDown key if necessary to ensure products are visible
Click on the first product item displayed on the shoes category page
Click the 'Add to Cart' button for the selected product
Navigate to the cart page by clicking the cart icon or link
Verify that there is exactly one product in the cart
Click on the 'Checkout Button' on the cart page
Verify that after clicking the Checkout button, the user remains on the same page
Check that the 'Name' and 'Email' fields display an error state (red border) indicating required input
Take a screenshot of the completed task to confirm the test was successful

generatedSteps.stepsSummary: User login, select product, and validate checkout
